title.rendered: Blue Hyundai teams up with Smile Foundation to support girl child education

content.rendered:
Blue Hyundai from Bangalore recently teamed up with Smile Foundation to support education under its She Can Fly campaign which champions for the cause of girl child education in India. The car dealer will donate an amount towards the education of the girl child for every car they sell.

“We got in touch with Smile Foundation and we were very happy with the work they have been doing to improve the lives of the underprivileged kids. Together we launched ‘She Can Fly’ campaign to support education of underprivileged but deserving girl children. We decided to donate part proceeds from car sales of every customer towards educating girl children.”- said Latif Hussain Managing Director of Blue Hyundai
